public void register(java.lang.String linkName,
                     Link link)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                     java.net.MalformedURLException
Description copied from interface: Middleware
Register a specified link in the registry service of the middleware under a specified name. This link becomes available to be remotely retrieved with the retrieve method.

Specified by:
register in interface Middleware
Parameters:
linkName - the link name in URL format
link - the link object to be registered

internalize

public Datatype internalize(Datatype arg)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: Middleware
Uncode a coded datatype object. The specified datatype must have been coded with the externalize method of this middleware. This method should use the readExternal method of the Datatype interface.

Specified by:
internalize in interface Middleware
Parameters:
arg - the coded datatype to be uncoded
Returns:
an uncoded datatype object.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the readExternal method throws an exception.

internalize

public Datatype[] internalize(Datatype[] args)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: Middleware
Uncode an array of specified datatypes. It invokes the internalize(Datatype) method for each Datatype object of the array.

Specified by:
internalize in interface Middleware
Parameters:
args - the array of Datatype objects to be uncoded
Returns:
the array of datatype objects, with its members uncoded
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if internalize(Datatype) throws an exception

externalize

public Datatype externalize(Datatype arg)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: Middleware
Code an uncoded datatype object. The specified datatype is put in the appropriate format to be transmitted through this middleware. It can be uncoded with the internalize method of this middleware. This method should use the writeExternal method of the Datatype interface.

Specified by:
externalize in interface Middleware
Parameters:
arg - the uncoded datatype to be coded
Returns:
a new coded datatype object
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the writeExternal method throws an exception.

externalize

public Datatype[] externalize(Datatype[] args)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: Middleware
Code an array of specified datatypes. It invokes the externalize(Datatype) method for each Datatype object of the array.

Specified by:
externalize in interface Middleware
Parameters:
args - the array of Datatype objects to be coded
Returns:
the array of coded objects
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if externalize(Datatype) throws an exception
